benchmark_details.name: FedScale
benchmark_details.overview: FedScale is a federated learning benchmarking suite with realistic datasets and a scalable runtime to enable reproducible federated learning research.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enable scalable and reproducible federated learning research through a diverse set of realistic datasets and a flexible runtime environment.

data.source: Various real-world datasets curated for federated learning tasks.
data.format: Various formats including images, audio, and text

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance and system efficiency of federated learning models across different tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance under federated learning conditions; lower communication costs are preferable.
